author: admin
title: UNN, the Nigerian university where lecturers depend on student's evaluation - NAIJ.COM
text: UNN, the Nigerian university where lecturers depend on student’s evaluation NAIJ.COM The table is about to turn with the new circular that has been passed at the University of Nigeria in Nsukka. UNN lecturers will with the new bill have their performances reviewed by students. While this is apparently a good move for the educational …
